name: Adventure C Ship Of Doom
summary: You must find the control button and free your ship, which is simple enough, though... shall we say... reminiscent of the plot of Adventure A: Planet of Death and many, many other sci-fi text adventures. I will shortly reveal quite a few details about the game's plot, so if you wish to experience Ship of Doom for yourself, I advise you to give it a go before continuing.
